templateVersions.content:
Merge these memories while PRESERVING SPECIFICITY.
Existing memories: --- {!$Input:consolidatedMemory} ---
New memories: --- {!$Input:newMemory} ---
Rules: 1. KEEP specific object/field names - don't generalize "opportunities with Amount" to "data displays" 2. KEEP trigger contexts - preserve "when showing pipeline" not just "generally prefers" 3. KEEP examples - if a memory includes an example scenario, keep it 4. NEWER wins - when memories conflict, keep the more recent version 5. Organize into 2-4 sections with simple headings (e.g., Data Display, Communication Style)
Bad consolidation (too general): "User prefers detailed data in structured formats"
Good consolidation (preserves specificity): "When showing opportunities, user prefers tables with Amount, Stage, CloseDate When showing accounts, user wants Industry field included"
Return ONLY the consolidated memory content, no meta-commentary.
